info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 2:40PM EST until November 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with isolated higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Herkimer County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most persistent bands of snow are expected late tonight into Thursday morning around Routes 8 and 365, where locally higher totals up to 9 inches are possible. Snowfall rates could exceed an inch an hour at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
